The progressbar shows the percentage of correctly answered questions. The empty bar indicates the percentage of questions never answered before. The orange bar denotes the percentage of questions answered once and the green bar questions answered thrice. The bar stops at three iterations, because after answering questions three times the learner is considered well learned.

In the following the overall quantity of the questions is shown and a list showing the statistic of the iterations with the learning progress of the user.
